div.p: This value set defines a set of codes that are used to indicate the profile type of a test system when acting as the destination within a TestScript.
This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/testscript-profile-destination-types defines the following codes:

tr.td: General FHIR server used to respond to operations sent from a FHIR client.
A FHIR server acting as a Structured Data Capture Form Manager.
A FHIR server acting as a Structured Data Capture Form Processor.
A FHIR server acting as a Structured Data Capture Form Receiver.

description.value: This value set defines a set of codes that are used to indicate the profile type of a test system when acting as the destination within a TestScript.

definition.value: General FHIR server used to respond to operations sent from a FHIR client.
A FHIR server acting as a Structured Data Capture Form Manager.
A FHIR server acting as a Structured Data Capture Form Processor.
A FHIR server acting as a Structured Data Capture Form Receiver.
